original_title: Tear gas and water cannons fired at protesting unemployed grads
original_body_lines: UPDATE (01.35 p.m.) : Police have once again fired tear gas and water cannons to disperse a group of unemployed graduates protesting near Diyatha Uyana at the Parliament Road Junction.
Police used water cannons to disperse a group of unemployed graduates protesting near the Diyatha Uyana at the Parliament Road Junction.
